title: [Placements] Placement Sheet 2026 Batch
content: Anyone maintaining placement sheet for the 2026 batch?

comments.body: Is Amazon coming for placements?
No, they are not coming sadly ðŸ˜”
how many companies asked for 9+ and 8.5+ approximately?
9+ almost 5 companies till now; 8.5+ almost 80% of the companies
can i dm?
Yeah sure
Are they considering percentage of both 10th and 12 th like minimum 90 percentage above
No only one company till now has asked about 10th and 12th.
Ok
Are placements happening for both rr and ec combinely or first rr students then ec students
It's always combined, there is no such partition like rr and ec when it comes to placements
If anyone wants a referral to Amazon (off campus), feel free to DM
whats the minimum for 10 and 12 for that company?

Not all companies will consider it 
As far now 2 companies mentioned the criteria above 90%
AWS came for cloud support role last year
Can you list them plzzz
which companies were those??
Stocx,Green light

Meesho - No criteria
Eternal - 8.5+
MMT - 8.5+
Flipkart - No criteria
Schneider Electric - 75%,75%, 7.5
Vyapar - 8.5+
Couchbase - 8.5+
Netcore - 8+
Komprise - 8.5+
Ion group - 75%,75%,7.5
cbx1 - 9+
arctic wolf - 60%,60%,6
titan - 75%,75%, 7.5
Stockx- 90%,90%,9
Greenlight - 85%,85%,9.1+
Schneider was 90% in 10&12 with 8.5+ cg (eventual cutoff)
I deleted the final cutoff message, so I mentioned initial one ðŸ˜…
How much was final shortlist? Only 9+ or 9.x+

Stockx- final shortlist is not out
Greenlight - 9.1
Do yk anything about ece core companies placement data??
No idea about that
Okay thanks bro

[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1TWHZI7pmkmSPa5HXbGXXNqrITgOaB8UaW9kP0bLv\_FY/edit?gid=0#gid=0](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1TWHZI7pmkmSPa5HXbGXXNqrITgOaB8UaW9kP0bLv_FY/edit?gid=0#gid=0)
Thank you so much man, appreciate it

Hello .

Do u have any idea regarding vesting period of stocks of tekion (the extra stocks that are mentioned)?
For how many roles did Tekion come?
They came for software role and hired 10 people
thanks
Did both column  name means it+ft or it+pbc since i think tekion came for it+pbc? and if its  it+ft then what is it+pbc (internship column)?
The first column is it+pbc/it only; The second one is it+fte
oh means tekion did take ft people in our college they came for only pbc
In pes they came for it+fte
in vit they came for internship, but its conversion based. Wonder how they came for ft in pes since mostly they hire performance based conversion.
